name: SDG.gov.pl Data Catalog
description: The official Polish SDG data catalog offering a set of about 250 global indicators with data for Poland for monitoring the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). The catalog is used to assess progress at the national and international level, as defined by the UN.
owner_name: Statistics Poland (national coordinator of SDG monitoring) in cooperation with the Ministry of Economic Development and Technology (coordinator of SDG implementation)
